attributes.action: Stop Police Budget Cuts! Less money will mean less officers. Less officers endangers both our communities & the men/women who serve our police forces
attributes.additional_details: Get the budget cuts withdrawn for the police forces. Public safety should not be reduced to money. The London riots proved that there are less officers across England, the resources employed would never be sustainable. The fact all leave was cancelled, all training was cancelled and all shifts went to 12hrs shows this. Our forces are struggling already, shouldn't they be supported by those they serve unquestionably?
